reviews.review: Loppubossi on perseestä koska moongaravity. Muuten tosi hyvä peli aivokuollutta tekoälyä lukuunottamatta. Pelasin muuten oikeesti jotain 15 tuntia, steam vaan kusee ja sanoo et 5.

Just finished the game, definitely would recommend to play for others and it is one of the classics. The only downsides were that the controls were a bit janky, the speed along with the collision physics of the player sometimes was weird when going over platforming obstacles, but I guess it's because I have played many more newer games and wasn't familiar with the older game movement, I would just recommend to save the game multiple times thorughout the platforming puzzles if you want to make it easier. All in all, great game, gonna go play the dlc and move on to Half Life 2.

Half-life conta uma história brilhante de um cientista (Gordon Freeman), após a confusão em Black Mesa. Sobrevivência, mistério, puzzle e trilha sonora nesse jogo é expecional e perfeito. Half-life mudou completamente a indústria dos games FPS. Recomendo!!!!!!!!

1998 неизвестная компания Valve на основе квейка создаёт великую игру. Которая ставит планку качества на многие годы.
Игра очень интересна сюжетом, геймплеем, и многими моментами. Единственный минус на данный момент HD пак. Все оружия кроме двух неправильны по смыслу. Это MP5A3(M16A2) и GLOCK-18(Berreta 92). В оригинале было понятно что патрон 9х18мм использует и пистолет, и пп. Но M16A2(в HD) использует 5.56 патрон.

Довольно хорошая старенькая игра особенно с мультиплеером или CO-OP"ом.

Here's the thing: if you're interested in the Half-Life series, this isn't the place you HAVE to start. Honestly, starting with the next installment, Half-Life 2, it does a decent job basically creating an entirely different storyline. If you're a big fan of getting ALL of the in-jokes and references, then yes, plot-wise you could start here for sure.

It's fairly short, about a ten hour romp. It's the oldest game I've every actually played and finished, and I have to admit I think they were still in the midst of figuring out how to scale difficulty back in 1998 (you can save anywhere so it's not a big deal, but there were plenty of times I'd be reloading a save like a hundred darn times).

Overall it's a very fun shooter with lots of atmosphere and action and comedy and everything you can ask for. You can see how this short little escape from a strange scientific facility became the starting point for one of the biggest names in gaming.

El juego es una obra maestra para su tiempo, hoy en día el primer Half Life se mantiene fresco gracias a mods o incluso por la comunidad como lo hizo Black Mesa.
Tras todos sus años de ser conocido como uno de los mejores juegos de culto decidí probarlo, y quiero aclarar que no soy fan de los juegos shooter, al jugarlo al inicio me resultaba realmente genérico... Pero entre mas avanzaba la trama mas me intrigaba, al final terminé por ver lo que muchos han logrado ver en este juego, una historia genial y un combate frenético en algunas partes... Aun cuando no me gusta este tipo de juegos puedo recomendarlo mucho, pues pasarlo no será una perdida de tiempo. 
Solo si mencionaré que Gordon F. corre como loco en este juego jajaja.

Es un juego genial de principio a fin, aún cuando tiene un diseño "anticuado", no es una excusa para querer jugar completamente al juego. Historia increíble, jugabilidad divertida y con un buen grado de dificultad y un final muy abierto e impactante, ademas de boss fights en las que hay que pensar bastante si es la primera vez que se juega al juego. Además es un juego en que si te atascas muchas veces en una zona o fase, con tus mismos errores va a poder aprender a salir de esa zona.

Эта одна из тех игр, где по-началу ты наслаждаешься ею, а дальше, когда думаешь, что наступил конец понимаешь, что конец будет позже, итак ты думаешь раза 3-4. Ты встретил сложного соперника, победил его, думаешь конец, а оказывается там ещё несколько боссов. Но последнего было легче одолеть, чем каких-то минибоссов или чудиков, которых ты видишь, путешествуя по мирам. Игра прикольная! Также, играя в Half-Life я понял насколько я тупой, пройдя её за 20 часов, подсматривая иногда в начале гайды, когда какой-то чел на ютубе это сделал за 5 часов(

Great game! It's a great fps that defined the new way of storytelling. Has a lot of cool guns and enemies and plot and generally there's just a lot of great stuff. However it's also an old game. Graphics aren't THAT bad but still, they're from 1998. You can also find some bugs here and there, for example I got stuck in the vent corner a lot of times. And of course, the Xen dimension. Damn it's bad. Jumping, jumping, jumping and then you die because you couldn't reach the next platform when long-jumping. Xen has a potential to look good - just look at Black Mesa screens - and in Half-Life it doesn't. Don't get me wrong, Half-Life still is awesome - until you go to Xen. The final boss is good. I enjoyed it. However I still have this feeling that Black Mesa did everything just better even though I haven't play it yet while writing this review so I'm just depending on reviews and screens I've seen in the internet. I will play Black Mesa and then I will update if in my opinion it's worth to play Half-Life or skip it and go straight to Black Mesa. For now, still depending only on the internet reviews and screens from Black Mesa, I'd say that you can skip Half-Life and play Black Mesa instead unless you are big fan of Half-Life series, 'cause for example you played HL2 and episodes at first- then I think you should know the original.

I was drawn to Half-Life by its place in the history of video games, and its reputation as one of the greatest games of all time. Though it was certainly important for its time, I would not strongly recommend it for anyone looking for an extremely engaging experience, especially if they are more interested in story than (undoubtably good) gameplay. The atmosphere and plot are exciting at the beginning, but the game progressed at a very slow pace, and lost its wonderful creepiness after a while. By the final scenes, I was expecting to be rewarded for many long hours I had put into Freeman's battle, but I never found the epic climax I was hoping for. I must admit that due to some 'technical issues' I was not able to reach the very end of the game, so I will be charitable and say I probably missed something. In the final analysis, I think this game is a bit overrated, though I am sure there will be many who disagree with me.

Сюжет и мультиплеер в Half-Life просто замечательные. Старый, но всё еще кайфовый шутан, где вы играете за молчаливого ученого. Весь смысл сюжетки - накостылять врагам, дать п#зды инопланетному ребенку-переростку и устроиться на высокооплачиваемую работу. Если интересуетесь олдовыми игрухами - однозначно стоит попробовать!

Про мультиплеер... Много опытных игроков, кто еще остался на серверах, скорее всего будут выносить вас очень и очень быстро, но на пофаниться вполне пойдёт.

В общем, Half-Life однозначно стоит того, чтоб её пройти
